title: Set barn logo as PWA app icon and enable installable PWA support

requirements.text: Generate the 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' barn logo image (white background, dark gray barn illustration with arched text and 'For accurate measure' tagline) in all required PWA icon sizes: 192×192, 512×512, and 180×180 (Apple Touch Icon). Save them as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/.

quotes: Make this as app logo and make it as an will been downloaded like a native app

acceptanceCriteria: All icons visually match the uploaded barn logo with white background

requirements.text: Update frontend/public/manifest.json to use the generated barn logo icons: set the 192×192 and 512×512 icons to point to the generated asset paths, set app name to 'SPA For Accurate Measure', short_name to 'SPA Measure', background_color to '#ffffff', theme_color to '#ffffff', display to 'standalone', and start_url to '/'.

quotes: App name: SPA For Accurate Measure

acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json name is 'SPA For Accurate Measure'
manifest.json icons array references the generated 192×192 and 512×512 PNG files

requirements.text: Update frontend/index.html to reference the generated apple-touch-icon (180×180) in the <link rel='apple-touch-icon'> tag and ensure the <link rel='manifest'> points to /manifest.json. Verify theme-color meta tag is set to '#ffffff'.

quotes: make it as an will been downloaded like a native app

requirements.text: Ensure frontend/public/sw.js (service worker) is correctly registered and caches the app shell so the app works offline and qualifies for the browser's 'Add to Home Screen' / install prompt on both iOS and Android.

quotes: make it as an will been downloaded like a native app

acceptanceCriteria: Service worker is registered in index.html
App shell files (index.html, manifest.json, icons) are precached on install
App passes PWA installability criteria (manifest + service worker + HTTPS)
Install prompt appears on supported Android browsers

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/main.tsx
Theme color must remain white (#ffffff) to match the barn logo's clean white background
nonGoals: Changing the app's core calculator functionality
Redesigning the visual theme or color palette
Adding push notifications or background sync to the service worker
